name: Alsaahir
ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Banshee is killed by the Demon, place the HAS ABILITY reminder token next to the Banshee and say THE BANSHEE HAS AWOKEN
name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
otherNightReminder: Choose a character type that is different from the Seen reminder. Point to a character who is of that type. Move the Balloonist's Seen reminder from the old player, to the new character.
name: Balloonist
ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

name: High Priestess
firstNightReminder: The High Priestess learns a player whom the Storyteller believes would help their team the most.
otherNightReminder: The High Priestess learns a player whom the Storyteller believes would help their team the most.
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

firstNightReminder: The Knight starts knowing two people who are not the Demon.
name: Knight
ability: You start knowing two people who are not the Demon.

firstNightReminder: The Shugenja starts knowing if their closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: The Steward starts knowing 1 good player.
name: Steward
Village Idiot
firstNightReminder: The Village Idiot points to a player. They learn that player's alignment.
otherNightReminder: The Village Idiot points to a player. They learn that player's alignment.
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk

otherNightReminder: If the Hatter dies, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.
name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

firstNightReminder: The Ogre chooses a player and, without exception, becomes their alignment.
name: Ogre
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor dies, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the “Mad” reminder and the second player with the “2nd” reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the “Mad” reminder and the second player with the “2nd” reminder.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

firstNightReminder: Wake the summoner up so that they can receive their three bluffs.
otherNightReminder: If the summoner has the Night Three token, wake them up so that they can pick a player to become a Demon of their choice.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

firstNightReminder: Announce that the Vizier is in play, as well as which player it is.
name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

firstNightReminder: The Kazali chooses which players are which Minions.
otherNightReminder: The Kazali chooses which player dies tonight.
name: Kazali
ability: Every night but the first, choose a player: they die. You choose which players are Minions. [-? to +? Outsiders]

otherNightReminder: The Ojo chooses a character to die. If the chosen character is not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
name: Ojo
ability: Every night but the first, choose a character: they die. If you choose a character that is not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

name: Yaggababble
otherNightReminder: The Yaggababble starts knowing a secret phrase. Every time they Yaggababble says it publicly today, a player might die.
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
